definitions.definition: A person with poor judgment or little intelligence.
definitions.example: The village fool threw his own shoes down the well.

definitions.definition: A jester; a person whose role was to entertain a sovereign and the court (or lower personages).
Someone who derives pleasure from something specified.
A type of dessert made of puréed fruit and custard or cream.
definitions.example: an apricot fool; a gooseberry fool

definitions.definition: (often capitalized, Fool) A particular card in a tarot deck, representing a jester.
To act in an idiotic manner; to act foolishly
